entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 6:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

Temperature: -3.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %

Dewpoint: -9.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
